    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(java.lang.String name,
              int role,
              CollectoClient client)
        Creates a new Player object.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the player
        role - - the turn of the player
        client - - CollectoClient
        Requires
        name != null;, (role == 0) || (role ==1);
        Ensures
        collection.length == 7;, (score == 0);, the role of this player will be assigned a role, the name of this player will be name

    • Method Detail

      • calulateScore

        public void calulateScore()
        Calculate player's score.
        Ensures
        score = \old(score + (collection[i] / 3)) for i from 1 to 6 corresponding to 6 color in collection

      • determineMove

        public abstract int[] determineMove​(Board board)
        Determines the indices for the next move.
        Parameters:
        board - the current game board
        Returns:
        the player's choice
        Requires
        board is not null and still has possible move
        Ensures
        the returned in is a array of length 1 for SingleMove or length 2 for DoubleMove

      • makeMove

        Makes a move on the board.
        Parameters:

        Requires

      • updateCollection

        public void updateCollection​(java.util.List<Ball> collectedList)

        Parameters:
        collectedList - is the list of ball after Board.collectBall();
        Requires

      • resetPlayer

        public void resetPlayer()
        Reset the player's collection and score after a game over.
        Ensures
        (this.collection == new int[7]) and (this.score == 0)
